actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conservation of energy by amending the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a taxpayer an income tax deduction for insulation improvement or repair expenditures.

summary.text: Allows an income tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for insulation improvement or repair expenditures with respect to any building owned, leased, or rented by the taxpayer during the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conservation of energy by amending the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a taxpayer an income tax deduction for insulation improvement or repair expenditures.
